summary: REAR SLIDING WINDOW FRAME CRACKED IN THREE PLACES, LEAKS WATER INTO CAB.  REPLACED ONCE UNDER WARRANTY WITH SAME PLASTIC FRAME.  ONE YEAR LATER TWO CRACKS ALREADY.  $275 AFTER MARKET WINDOW HAS METAL FRAME.  CALLED GM WILL NOT HELP WITH ANY OF THE COST.  DOOR SEALS ALSO LEAK AND MAKE NOISE AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS. *JB
